title: A bill to improve United States hurricane forecasting, monitoring, and warning capabilities, and for other purposes.
content: Improved Hurricane Tracking and Forecasting Act of 2007 - Directs the Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) to carry out a program for an improved ocean surface winds vector satellite for purposes including: (1) to address science and application questions related to air-sea interaction, coastal circulation, and biological productivity. (2) to improve forecasting for hurricanes, coastal winds and storm surge, and other weather-related disasters. (3) to ensure continuity of quality for satellite ocean surface vector wind measurements so that existing weather forecasting and warning capabilities are not degraded. And (4) to advance satellite ocean surface vector wind data capabilities.
